title: Angel's Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Mediterranean, Take-out, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little restaurant offering sandwiches, salads, paninis, nonalcoholic beverages. Run by a man who moved here from Israel. The vegetarian meals are labeled with a V, can be made vegan by asking for no cheese. Keeps soy and almond milk substitute for cow's milk in coffee and tea. Uses organic produce.
